item.title: Blog 1- Least Angle Regression LARS
item.description:
What is LARS?

Before we get into what lars is, we must take a peek into forward selection and forward stagewise regression. LARs treats each feature of the data as a vector and moves in a direction to minimizethe difference between its angle with equally likely features. For simplicity, we â€¦
